hero.headline: Firm Features at Practice Pricing (12 Months)
hero.subhead: Join a select cohort of firms modernizing research and workflows with vector-powered semantic search.
bullets: 12 months: Firm-tier features at Practice pricing
Preferred Founder discount locked forever after year one
Input on roadmap + early access to new features

faq.a: We're offering white-glove onboarding and direct roadmap input. Keeping the cohort small ensures quality and speed.
You keep a preferred Founder discount for life (currently 25% below public pricing).
Yes. Each tenant is isolated, and semantic search respects tenant boundaries.
